Site info

Website elements

Colours

The colours are borrowed from Fragonard:

knitr::include_graphics("images/col_pal_fragonard.jpg")

The colour palette looks like this:

scales::show_col(c("#23A7CE", "#97D0D7", "#2AB9B7"))
